s.text: No, worse than awful: desperate" (Lisa Schwarzbaum, Entertainment Weekly ). Instead of going for the tongue-in-cheek, campy horror style so popular of late, director Jan De Bont ( Speed ) relies on old-fashioned things-that-go-bump-in-the-night scares.
The first copies of Talk will be handed out at next Monday's launch party--held at the Statue of Liberty, which is federal, not state, property--and it hits newsstands Tuesday.
